channel.title: The Last Viking on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Venice: Anders Thomas Jensen on ‘The Last Viking,’ Mads Mikkelsen and Why He’s Team ABBA
item.description: The Danish writer-director reunites with his ‘Riders of Justice’ star in a crazy dramedy that unites the Beatles, Vikings and identity politics.
